downward_dog.name: Downward Dog
downward_dog.description: A foundational yoga pose that stretches the entire body, promoting relaxation and reducing stress.
steps: Step 1: Start on your hands and knees, with wrists under shoulders and knees under hips.
Step 2: Lift your hips up and back, straightening your legs as much as comfortable.
Step 3: Spread your fingers wide and press evenly through your palms, forming an inverted 'V' shape.
benefits: Relieves tension in the back and shoulders
Improves circulation, aiding blood pressure regulation
Calms the mind, reducing stress and anxiety

triangle_pose.name: Triangle Pose
triangle_pose.description: A lateral stretch that opens the chest and enhances flexibility, fostering a sense of calm.
steps: Step 1: Stand with your feet about 3-4 feet apart, turning your right foot out 90 degrees and left foot slightly in.
Step 2: Extend your arms out to the sides at shoulder height.
Step 3: Reach your right hand down toward your right shin or the floor, lifting your left arm up, gazing toward your left hand.
benefits: Stretches the sides of the body, reducing physical stress
Enhances breathing capacity, supporting blood pressure control
Promotes mental clarity and emotional balance

warrior_ii.name: Warrior II
warrior_ii.description: A powerful standing pose that strengthens the legs and improves focus, helping to alleviate stress and enhance resilience.
steps: Step 1: Stand with your feet wide apart, about 3-4 feet, depending on comfort.
Step 2: Turn your right foot out 90 degrees and your left foot slightly in, aligning your heels.
Step 3: Bend your right knee to a 90-degree angle, keeping it over your ankle, and extend your arms parallel to the ground, gazing over your right hand.
benefits: Strengthens the legs and core, supporting physical stability
Improves circulation, aiding in blood pressure management
Enhances mental focus and reduces stress, beneficial for diabetes control
